Sentencas: Reducing nickel oxide in solid oxide cell (SOC) electrodes is a critical step during the early stages of cell operation.
Titulo: Elucidating nickel oxide reduction in a Ni-YSZ solid oxide cell via in-situ X-ray nano holo-tomography

Sentencas: It is considered crucial in shaping the final microstructure of the fuel electrode.
Titulo: Elucidating nickel oxide reduction in a Ni-YSZ solid oxide cell via in-situ X-ray nano holo-tomography

Sentencas: In this work, we investigate the NiO reduction process in a state-of-the-art Solid Oxide Cell (SOC) using in-situ X-ray nano-holo-tomography.
Titulo: Elucidating nickel oxide reduction in a Ni-YSZ solid oxide cell via in-situ X-ray nano holo-tomography

Sentencas: Results show a fast reaction kinetics and a reaction front from the outer to the inner regions of the sample.
Titulo: Elucidating nickel oxide reduction in a Ni-YSZ solid oxide cell via in-situ X-ray nano holo-tomography

Sentencas: NiO reduction is complete in the first few seconds and the metallic Ni particles present a sponge-like structure, with many nanocrystallites and internal nano porosity.
Titulo: Elucidating nickel oxide reduction in a Ni-YSZ solid oxide cell via in-situ X-ray nano holo-tomography

Sentencas: After reduction, the Ni network undergoes coarsening, increasing its particle size.
Titulo: Elucidating nickel oxide reduction in a Ni-YSZ solid oxide cell via in-situ X-ray nano holo-tomography

Sentencas: Based on the acquired data, we propose a new chain of reaction mechanisms for forming the Ni nanocrystallites observed after reduction.
Titulo: Elucidating nickel oxide reduction in a Ni-YSZ solid oxide cell via in-situ X-ray nano holo-tomography
